page.title: 18Changing Times 2
page.content: A{quiet,country settlement}occupied by a{self-reliant}population of{farm {labourers,shop}and other{service {employees,foundrymen}and{ironstone {miners}has{changed}into a{dormitory town with{sprawling housing estates occupied by largely{middle-class {salaried employees. Their children attend{six modern {primary schools,a large comprehensive {school}and a{sixth form college,}which have{replaced}the{two junior {/elementary schools}and the{grammar {school}founded in{1561 by}the{last {Prior of Guisborough,Prior Pursglove.
